{{cpp/identifier with special meaning/title|{{tt|final}} {{mark since c++11}}}}
{{cpp/keyword/navbar}}

===Usage===
* {{ltt|cpp/language/final}} specifier

===Example===
{{source|
struct b0 final {};
struct d0 : b0 {}; // Error: cannot derive from final base

struct b1
{
    virtual void f0() final;
    virtual void f1();
};

struct d1 : b1 // OK
{
    void f0(); // Error: cannot override final function
    void f1(); // OK
};
}}
